articles.title: Maid gets jail after memorising elderly woman's ATM card PIN and withdrawing S$18000 - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A maid hired by a man to care for his mother instead stole the elderly woman's ATM card and used it to withdraw S$18,000 over 36 occasions. 

Indonesian national Anastasia Paba, 35, was sentenced to 25 weeks' jail on Tuesday (Feb 15) for a charge…

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Automated clearance to be the norm for all travellers into Singapore from 2023: ICA - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): From next year, all travellers will be able to use automated lanes upon arrival into Singapore for faster immigration clearance, said the Immigration and Checkpoints Authority (ICA) on Tuesday (Feb 15).
